definition: to be successful in one's studies/academic success
to learn/to study/to imitate/science/-ology
surname Ye

surname Cheng

sentences.english: There is no end in learning. A lot of efforts are needed for final achievement.
sentences.chinese: 学海无涯苦作舟，想要学业有成必须经过一番努力。

sentences.english: You will have success at school around the middle of the month.
sentences.chinese: 大约在本月中旬，你将学业有成。
